description: provide a service that monitors the use of the energy star name and marks in online marketplaces across Canada.
full_summary:
# ENERGY STAR Brand Monitoring

## Project Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-6868-48098544
*   **Amendment Number**: 4
*   **Tender Announcement Number**: 5000072745-C
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-06-30
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-24T14:00:00 (Closed)
*   **Expected Contract Dates**: None

## Service Description

The Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) department is seeking a service provider to monitor the use of the ENERGY STAR brand (name and marks) on online marketplaces across Canada. The primary objectives of this service include:

*   Identifying instances of misuse of the ENERGY STAR brand or marks, such as unauthorized use of the ENERGY STAR certification mark on uncertified products
*   Monitoring the most visible online marketplaces, including large-scale retailers and known targets identified by NRCan

## Solicitation Details

*   **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: This tender is open to contractors who are eligible to participate in the following trade agreements:
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
*   **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

## Evaluation Criteria

The selection of the service provider will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

*   **Name**: Raymond Thai
*   **Email**: raymond.thai@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: (343) 543-7427

## Attachments

The tender documentation can be accessed at the following URLs:
